column1: MRI image size (128, 256, 1) in weighting T2 of a man of 37 years old, of sagittal section n°135 starting from the right hemisphere of the skull. The image reveals the presence of the brainstem of volume 988.7695 mm³, the cerebrospinal fluid of volume 2.6367 mm³, the white matter of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 2846.3379 mm³, the cortex of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 6649.8047 mm³, the right lateral ventricle of volume 366.5039 mm³, the white matter of right hemisphere of cerebellum of volume 326.9531 mm³, the right cerebellar cortex of volume 1711.2305 mm³, the right thalamus proper of volume 445.6055 mm³, the right caudate nucleus of volume 40.8691 mm³, the right hippocampus of volume 3.9551 mm³, the right nucleus accumbens of volume 39.5508 mm³ and the right ventral diencephalon of volume 247.8516 mm³.
